current_projects.title: Scrum Dashboard
current_projects.description: Interactive project management display that puts all your active projects & areas on a hexagonal grid.

almost_ready.title: Music Fairy
almost_ready.description: A command line tool to analyze your streaming history from Spotify, written in Python and SQL. Example functions: what songs did I listen to most on this day? What artists did I listen to the most in a specific month?

almost_ready.title: AutoGen Docker experiment
almost_ready.description: A few Dockerfiles plus a walkthrough that will help you set up AutoGen inside a Docker container and connect it to an open-source large language model with Ooba Booga. In the example, I use Mixtral.
almost_ready.tech_stack: Docker, AutoGen, Ooba Booga, Google Colab, Mixtral/Hugging Face

almost_ready.title: This website!
almost_ready.description: The source code for this website.
almost_ready.tech_stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript/Typescript, React, Next.js, Vercel

almost_ready.title: Pokémon Locations/pypkmn
almost_ready.description: Also this: https://github.com/cameronsweeney/pokemon-locations. Some Python code that reads wild Pokémon location data from ROMs of Pokémon Red, Blue, and Yellow. It also sends the data directly into a database backend for my Pokédex.
